Subsection.Text: A debtor, any secondary obligor, or any other secured party or lienholder may redeem collateral.
To redeem collateral, a person shall tender:

Paragraph.Text: Fulfillment of all obligations secured by the collateral; and
The reasonable expenses and attorney’s fees described in s. 679.615(1)(a).

Subsection.Text: A redemption may occur at any time before a secured party:

Paragraph.Text: Has disposed of collateral or entered into a contract for its disposition under s. 679.610; or
Has accepted collateral in full or partial satisfaction of the obligation it secures under s. 679.622.
